description: Ancient-looking guards stand proudly on a massive, winding wall resembling the Great Wall of China, built over rolling green hills. The irony lies in the immense scale and historical implication of such a structure being erected for the stated, trivial purpose of excluding a dog. The absurdity is heightened by the guards' smug expressions and the seemingly impractical path of the wall.  The scene presents a surreal juxtaposition of grand defense architecture with mundane, domestic concerns.
caption: “Now we’ll see if that dog can get in here!”
